channel.title: How do you change where customs are equipped
channel.description: hey guys i ws wondering how do i change where to equip my customs because all of them are equipping as a weapon and i wanna change em to like helmet and stuff any ideas?

item.title: How do you change where customs are equipped
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Check in either your Item or ItemAssistant classes.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change where customs are equipped
